channel.description: Made the site mobile-first. Should now properly be working on mobile

Once again rewrote the main site.
+ Changed layout + Added links page - Removed chat

Converted this list to an RSS feed so now you can get updated whenever the site updates!.
+ chatbox + title icon + more buttons + semantic html (hopefully) + more style/animations + easter eggs! - removed herobrine
Updated code so that the site layout is actually responsive on mobile.
